word:
Brother Bates is with us. He is coming to see you [in the] West. His duty is there for [the] present. I never saw him as free as now. God is with him. James sends much love to all the church. Accept the same from me. Please write as soon as possible.--Letter 2, 1852. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D.C. Sept. 3, 1987. Entire Letter.
